front.text: On this card, X is the number of Info tokens on Tattletale

text.p:
Reveal the top card of your deck. Then:
If it isn't an Ongoing, discard it.
If it is an Ongoing and no other copies of that card are in play, put it into play and put an Info token on Tattletale.
Otherwise, Tattletale deals X psychic damage to herself. Then remove all Info tokens from Tattletale.
While there are Info tokens on Tattletale, you may deal X psychic damage to a target and then remove an Info token from Tattletale
